---
title: "Intro here"
---

This is a boilerplate for CORI EDA works: 

If you want to start a small project and have a boilerplate quarto website for it you can go on the [source](https://github.com/ruralinnovation/boilerplate-eda-quarto) of thise website  and use the green button "Use this template" (pick "Create a new repository") and then follow classic GH workflows. 

![](use_template.png)

Amazing ressources about Quarto websites can be find here: <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.

## R

The [GitHub Action](https://github.com/ruralinnovation/boilerplate-eda-quarto/blob/main/.github/workflows/publish.yml) that is publishing the content of this web site is set up to run on:

- the lastet Ubuntu 
- add quarto
- add R (4.4.1) with tidyverse packages
